Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.productionview

Class DevelopmentCardView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.productionview.DevelopmentCardView
public class DevelopmentCardView
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the view for the buy of development card, the activation of development card and the position of the development card asked by the user depending on the constructor and handler used
Author:
Mirko Genoni

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentCardView

      public DevelopmentCardView​(DevelopmentCardToClient[][] input, TotalResourceCounter totalResourceCounter)
      Constructor for the shop of development card
      Parameters:
      input - is the development card shop state
      totalResourceCounter - contains a counter of all the material in possession of the player

    • DevelopmentCardView

      public DevelopmentCardView​(java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCardToClient> input, TotalResourceCounter totalResourceCounter)
      Constructor for the activation of a development card
      Parameters:
      input - contains all the cards possessed by the player
      totalResourceCounter - contains a counter of all the material in possession of the player

    • DevelopmentCardView

      public DevelopmentCardView​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> freeSpace, java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCardToClient> state, DevelopmentCardVisualization input)
      Constructor for the visualization of the position available for the player to position the development card
      Parameters:
      freeSpace - are boolean that indicates if the position is free or not
      state - contains the development card possessed already by the player
      input - contains the card bought by the player
